name: The All-Devourer
title: "The All-Devourer" Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King
desc: "Some tribe members believe that it has its current body shape because it has a unique physique, like the Qucusaur Tyrant... Though in fact, this is simply because it's lived for so long, and eaten way, WAY too much."
in_play_description: When you play a card whose name was not in the initial deck at the start of the match: Trigger Gluttonous Rex once. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
Fast Action: Equip this to your Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King. Your opponent draws 1 card, then you steal 1 card from your opponent's Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost.
When you play a card whose name was not in the initial deck at the start of the match: Trigger Gluttonous Rex once. (Once per Round)
(You must have Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
